name.baseName: 印后整理|印刷品（承印物为纸）、印刷品（承印物为塑料）、印刷品（承印物为金属）、印刷品（其他承印物）|无溶剂复合胶|所有印后整理工艺|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Solventless Composite Gluedidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management15，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Solventless Composite Gluedidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management15，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及各种承印物（包括纸张、塑料、金属和其他材料）上印刷产品的印后整理工艺。它覆盖了所有规模印后整理操作中无溶剂复合胶的应用。该工艺适用于需要表面整理且不使用溶剂的印刷材料生产行业。例如出版、包装、标签和广告行业。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码23,三级代码231.0文件，在完整版文件中第520页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management12，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是11、其他（溶剂法），其效率为12，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/总生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management15，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是1、其他（活性炭法），其效率为15，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/总生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management17，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是4、光解，其效率为17，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/总生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management17，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management34，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是2、其他（沸石转轮吸附法），其效率为34，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/总生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management39
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是9、低温等离子体，其效率为39，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/总生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management53，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是10、生物过滤法，其效率为53，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/总生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

nan
